thread.title: Mark Thompson
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Mark Thompson

author: Mark Thompson
title: Mark Thompson
text: The person who helped me out at this location superceeded my expectations by assisting with saving me the most money. I consider that to be a plus to the consumer. Shasta you went beyond the call of duty and that makes a customer like me tell others about your Outstanding performance in customer service.Thank You So Much and keep up the good work.
